thread.title: Giveaway: Win 1 of 5 NEW GoPro’s

author: Ronald Robbins
title: Giveaway: Win 1 of 5 NEW GoPro’s
text: By Ronald Robbins | October 8, 2015 - 4:29 pm | Travel Blog 0 Flares 0 Flares × Here’s the deal, you get until Midnight of October 31st, 2015 to win 1 of 5 New GoPro HERO4 Session’s or GoPro HERO4 Silver’s. What do you have to do to get your hands on one of these $400 cameras? Simply make a donation of $5 or more to my IndieGoGo Fundraising Campaign here for your chance to win. That’s it! No having dinner with the in-laws, no donating blood, and certainly no putting up with the obnoxious neighbor across the street. Just a donation and the chance to win is yours! Win 1-of-5 GoPro’s! Here’s how it works: Donate between October 9th, 2015 & Midnight of October 31st, you will earn a chance to win a New GoPro HERO4 Session or New GoPro HERO4 Silver! Minimum donation is:
